name: Overview

[{"id":"c5dfe7f3-e7f9-492a-9fef-8dce866aba2b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: create_namespaces_map","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"032b66a3-3154-4711-b506-39716e7917a4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"create_namespaces_map","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function constructs lookup tables that associate namespaces with their owning modules for both internal and external code. These tables enable fast and reliable resolution of where a given namespace originates.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"04bc45aa-2b98-4e5e-9cf1-1a80e4ceecbc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By precomputing these mappings, the formatter avoids repeated traversal of module structures during call graph and hierarchy construction.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5dc6d22e-b546-4c6b-8238-6a52af8f7ba8","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"a19c381b-d400-4912-b198-c8329ec18fc5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of this function is to support efficient classification of call graph nodes as internal or external. This classification is critical for generating accurate FASTEN call graphs that distinguish internal calls from external dependency calls.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3abbc527-f6b2-441e-b9a2-674d14e1f53a","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"4c1cf05c-3750-43b5-9ae1-45fd0665299d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2beec149-cdc0-4d83-ae80-5592b8286096","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When invoked, the function performs the following steps:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b27db4b3-7d95-4b72-8103-b0ad35a3d414","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Initializes two empty dictionaries:","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"ad23f8e9-5770-43ec-a88d-beb22f70b31d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"One for internal namespaces","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1f219e8c-0d17-477a-8e36-e80545f6c5ce","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"One for external namespaces","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"636ac3ff-149a-49d7-8bf9-b456747143e6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterates over internal and external module definitions in parallel","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d687e7a6-0a02-48e0-a316-85ddbab26157","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"For each module:","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"97d8f6a4-11ff-46f8-b320-eacebb08f428","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterates over all declared namespaces (methods) within that module","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b6d9e644-fcbd-4cd7-bc77-ce5b35df88d3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Records a mapping from each namespace to its parent module","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"b6cb4360-56a1-49d1-be90-2e79d9e2b082","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Returns both lookup tables as a pair of dictionaries","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"20acfac4-3cac-4d5e-b826-3aaa4364f57b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The resulting data structure allows constant-time lookup of a namespace’s module and origin.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd3c8587-47dc-43b5-8455-5eeeafe5c978","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"36b073e5-68c1-4ddc-b4e2-0bb706aaa101","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Returned Structure","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d03d1ee4-d946-4b29-b239-b21db78b05f3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function returns a list containing two dictionaries:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"25bebd97-350b-438c-8db0-bf1d1c22b4ae","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Index 0: Mapping of internal namespaces to internal module names","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"78e736d5-05cb-4d9a-b0be-4c8eca5bf92c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Index 1: Mapping of external namespaces to external module names","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b473e814-3ae4-409d-9e96-b91121b50227","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This structure is designed to align directly with how the call graph resolution logic consumes the mappings.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b4dcc547-c408-4737-aa77-3c3ae3d7965b","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"13e087e7-8f8a-4847-917e-b17b8e00e8c7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9459ca16-ffe4-41a6-aea7-96ddc3815329","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"create_namespaces_map","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" plays a key role in call graph construction by enabling the formatter to determine whether a call edge represents an internal or external interaction. It simplifies edge resolution logic and improves overall performance.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8e8fdf5b-f13e-4c2b-aad1-c96c23517239","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b7eb2a30-02d9-477c-9161-40e39d11b458","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d13a66ad-a744-4ab7-9c40-e6be6987aafd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Uses precomputation to optimize repeated namespace lookups","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8bf83b5a-856a-4eb5-b0bb-57ed51737131","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Maintains a clear separation between internal and external mappings","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c6b0cd04-a579-42f0-8312-095a8c1b3d51","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Avoids duplicating resolution logic in higher-level methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"36d00ae4-b117-4d44-a091-8671d328ecbd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Supports scalable processing of large codebases","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2f53c318-23cb-4a1d-9e73-f0f6bd5fcb84","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7668e299-5c12-4393-afbf-2da876d4a4e7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
